column4: Hey guys... anyone experiencing almost periodic gnome lags in the new feisty release?
*newer*
Eh, I use xfce for certain things, but I'm a big fan of Gnome... plus, I'm not totally sure it is Gnome.
I'm a huge fan of XFCE on resource challenged systems...
You played with Compiz Fusion much?
I understand.
I always say that... then I go off and screw it up anyway. I'm an obsessive re-installer... :)
I'm a huge fan of xfce on NON resource-challenged machines
sadly.. i just use the adobe flash player.... and I hate it so... when firefox goes boom... its generally at fault
Yeah, I read that Gnash was going to be implemented (is that correct?) in Gutsy, but when I tried the package for Feisty, YouTube threw up all over Firefox.
don't complicate things mon
if he is an american... he's pissed like all the rest of us that he can't watch something he paid for on his computer
Seriously? I've been using Automatix for... like, forever. Never really had a problem with it.
Now I'm aware -- that's the official stance from Ubuntu?
ever tried doing a distribution upgrade after installing things with automatix?
yes... that's the official stance
I've never had a dist-upgrade work on Ubuntu, Automatix or not.
Well, now I know that is the official stance, I'll definitely keep it in mind.
I've just backed up home, installed, and blown it out after install of the newest
I try to stay aware of the trends and recommendations.
::nods::
well you are now aware
